caption:
“Hunger of the body feeds the spirit.”

Reflection:
To fast is to remember what truly nourishes. When the body is emptied, the soul feasts on grace.

Commentary:
This reflection on fasting reminds us that physical restraint awakens spiritual depth. Hunger can sharpen gratitude and devotion.
